sect1.title: A Quick Start Overview
sect1.para: OUT OF DATE: Need also to provide a newDomain and newGrid scripts to provide out-of-the-box template setups. This is just too fiddly otherwise. Explain how to use these to generate the general idea, then newkey to change keys etc.

listitem.para: Create a configuration directory; this is a tree of directories rooted at /etc/peloton but it can be anywhere. Create this directory and the keys sub-directory.
